text: Firaon kehnay laga kiya meri ijazat say pehlay hi tum iss per eman ley aaye? Yaqeenan yehi tumhara woh bara buzrug hai jiss ney tum sab ko jadoo sikhaya hai (sunn lo) mein tumharay hath paon ultay seedhay katwa ker tum sab ko khajoor kay tano mein sooli per latakwa doon ga aur tumhen poori tarah maloom hojaye ga kay hum mein say kiss ki maar ziyada sakht aur dairpaa hai
